channel.title: Bootstrapped #126: Why Dave Rodenbaugh acquired an existing business instead of starting from scratch
channel.description:
When @daverodenbaugh wanted to run a software business, he decided to buy an existing one. He tells me why he did this, how he chose the business, and what he did right and wrong along the way.
He also shares - painfully - his embarrassing $50K mistake.
<iframe height="200px" width="100%" frameborder="no" scrolling="no" seamless src="https://player.simplecast.com/124e9f8a-2ab3-497e-b7be-d8af6f53d731?dark=false"></iframe>
Dave runs [Recapture](https://recapture.io/) and is co-host of the [Rogue Startups podcast](https://roguestartups.com/).
